name: Ninja Warrior Battle - An Assassin Spy Adventure!
name_original: Ninja Warrior Battle - An Assassin Spy Adventure!
description:
The Epic Battle Ninja Game is Now in the App Store!

Choose your character and battle the Black Ninja Forces. As the last remaining Ninja fighting for truth and justice, it is up to you to defeat the evil forces and bring peace to the land.

* Choose your weapons, select your armor and get get ready for battle.
* Visit the training centre to earn coins
* Change your tactics depending on which way the wind is blowing
* Beat your opponents and move up the ranks

PRO TIPS
- Visit the store to choose your weapons and kit
- Use a finger swipe to attack your opponents
- Switch between different weapons

https://www.facebook.com/BattleNinjaGame
